organisation_name: Association Belge des Consommateurs Test-Achats / Belgische Verbruikersunie Test Aankoop (Test-Achats)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Stakeholder consultation group for the Fitness Check of EU consumer and marketing law #E03423#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3423#Member#C
goals__remit: As a consumer organisation our goal is to inform, help and defend consumers in all their 'consumer activities'. We do this by providing them all information they need, by helping them in conflicts with businesses and service providers, by launching legal (class) actions, by representing them in advisory boards and commissions,  and by lobbying decision makers at all levels (regional, national, European, …)
position: Domain Head European Policy and Enforcement
